answers.answer: This is the HIV prevention forum. You should post your question on the related forum.

question: I am asking this for my brother.  He says he has been sweating only from the waste down.  He is 65 years old, has just recently had his gal bladder removed and also has Type II diabetes.  Any idea why he is having these episodes.  He has also recently visited the Philippines.
title: sweating from waste down on a man
